attributes.action: Scrap Bradford Safe and Sound Charges.
attributes.additional_details:
A petition to stop Bradford Council charging for an emergency response alarm system for the needy weather its elderly and/or Disabled on low incomes.

About Safe and Sound:

Safe and Sound quickly puts you in contact with someone should anything happen at home, such as a fall, at the time you need it, whether you live alone, with the family, care for someone else or have a disability. A response team is available in an emergency to help assess the situation, take the appropriate action and advise what needs to be done.
